DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test effectiveness out-of-school diabetes prevention program youth ( age 7-15 ) family history pre-diabetes type 2 diabetes .
DOC.detailed_description: The Insulin Superheroes Club ( ISC ) base Diabetes Prevention Program adult ( Knowler WC et al. , 2002 ) , develop Centers Disease Control Prevention ( CDC ) . We adapt curriculum youth serve supplement adult program . This program last 12 month , goal improve participant ' health reduce risk develop pre-diabetes type 2 diabetes . The ISC program include 16 weekly ( Phase 1 ) , 3 bi-weekly ( Phase 2 ) , 6 monthly ( Phase 3 ) session . Sessions include 60 minute physical fitness 30 minute education . The education portion include interactive teach health-related topic ( e.g. , nutrition , exercise , physiology , mindfulness , stress reduction ) use hand-on learning activity ( e.g. , cooking , craft , game , role play ) . All physical fitness activity incorporate moderate intensity exercise ( e.g. , push-ups , yoga , basketball , tag , dance ) .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Between 715 year old Parent grandparent pre/type II Diabetes Able participate physical activity Parent caregiver participation Exclusion criterion Pregnant female Those significant physical mental health illness would hinder study participation Medications would interfere test result
